ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts l, Vl and Vll — Flight Crew Member Hours of Work and Rest Periods)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, VI AND VII - FLIGHT CREW MEMBER HOURS OF WORK AND REST PERIODS) in order to (1) enhance safety within flight operations by improving the performance of flight crew members, by reducing their levels of fatigue; (2) update the Canadian Aviation Regulations based on International Civil Aviation Organization published Standards and relating to flight duty limitations and rest time, based on scientific principles and knowledge; and allowing for the use of Fatigue Risk Management System; and (3) reduce existing gaps with respect to maximum flight duty and rest time and ensure better alignment with other jurisdictions such as the United States and European Union.
